snippet: Daniel Navarro hung on to win the 13th stage of the Vuelta a España. His Spanish countryman Alberto Contador kept the overall leader’s red jersey.
abstract: Spanish cyclist Daniel Navarro wins 13th stage of the Vuelta a Espana, while his countryman Alberto Contador maintains overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Navarro hung on to win the 13th stage of the Vuelta a España. His Spanish countryman Alberto Contador kept the overall leader’s red jersey.

headline.main: Contador Maintains Lead in Vuelta a España
